{% extends 'apidoc.html' %} {% block title %}Tile5 API Documentation{% endblock %} {% block api %}

T5.zoomable(view, params)

This mixin is used to make an object support integer zoom levels which are implemented when the view scales

getZoomLevel()

Get the current zoom level for the map

setZoomLevel(value)

Update the map's zoom level to the specified zoom level
